name: LABYRINTH - Derelict Abyss
description:
LABYRINTH - Derelict Abyss is a top-down exploration game set in an ancient aetheral place with a mysterious past.

🜁 Explore rooms in any order you want without restrictions and enjoy detailed environments and haunting experimental music 🜁

🜁 Find secret rooms on your own or use the in-game hint system 🜁

🜁 Stumble upon new things organically through a carefully designed world 🜁

🜁 Collect 12 relics, and talk to the spirit of those that used to be 🜁

The game is free since I want everyone to be able to enjoy it, and can personally afford to do so for the time being. That said, I appreciate donations immensly and can promise you that they will go towards making future projects as fully realised as I possibly can. ♡Thank you!♡

Soundtrack by June Flower,
Sean Leffler (https://ringularity.bandcamp.com/)
and bleep (https://soundcloud.com/bleepsmusic)

Get the album here (for free as well):
june-flower.bandcamp.com/album/labyrinth-derelict-abyss-ost
